code: import React from'react';import{BookOpen,FileText,BarChart3,Settings as SettingsIcon}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const TabBar=_ref=>{let{activeTab,onTabChange}=_ref;const tabs=[{id:'quiz',label:'Quiz',icon:BookOpen,description:'Lernen'},{id:'vocabulary',label:'Vokabeln',icon:FileText,description:'Verwalten'},{id:'stats',label:'Statistiken',icon:BarChart3,description:'Fortschritt'},{id:'settings',label:'Einstellungen',icon:SettingsIcon,description:'Konfiguration'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-amber-50 to-stone-50 border-t border-amber-200/60 safe-area-pb shadow-2xl backdrop-blur-sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex",children:tabs.map(tab=>{const Icon=tab.icon;const isActive=activeTab===tab.id;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>onTabChange(tab.id),className:"flex-1 flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-3 px-1 min-h-[60px] transition-all duration-300 ".concat(isActive?'text-amber-700':'text-stone-500 hover:text-stone-700'),"aria-label":"".concat(tab.label," - ").concat(tab.description),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{size:22,className:"mb-1 opacity-90 ".concat(isActive?'text-amber-700':'text-stone-500')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xs font-light tracking-wide ".concat(isActive?'text-amber-700':'text-stone-500'),children:tab.label})]},tab.id);})})});};
